titleproper.value: Guide to the Linda F. Segal collection of Brooklyn Bridge Centennial records <num>2017.024</num>

creation.value: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace <date>2018-10-31T15:18:48</date>

unittitle.value: Linda F. Segal collection of Brooklyn Bridge Centennial records

abstract.value: The Linda F. Segal collection of Brooklyn Bridge Centennial records contains press packets, memorabilia, and news clippings relating to the celebration.

p.value: Identification of item, date (if known); Linda F. Segal collection of Brooklyn Bridge Centennial records, 2017.024, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
Linda F. Segal was the press agent for the Brooklyn Bridge Centennial Celebration, 1883-1983, planned by The 1983 Brooklyn Bridge Centennial Commission, Inc.

The Linda F. Segal collection of Brooklyn Bridge Centennial records contains news releases, invitations, pamphlets, programs, souvenir books, newspaper and magazine articles, and a catalog for The Great East River Bridge show at The Brooklyn Museum. All of the materials relate to the celebrations associated with the Brooklyn Bridge centennial. The press materials, pamphlets, and souvenir books contain extensive information on the various events which comprised the Brooklyn Bridge Centennial Celebration. The invitations, pamphlets, and museum exhibition catalog document associated events. The press clippings include a reprint of the May 24, 1883, issue of The New York Times which included an article on the bridge's opening ceremony.

corpname.value: The 1983 Brooklyn Bridge Centennial Commission, Inc.
